Title:
Cortinarius bovarius (Agaricales), a new species from western
North America
Abstract:
Cortinarius bovarius sp. nov., a conifer associated taxon
growing on calcareous ground, is described from western North America.
Phylogenetic relationships and species limits were investigated using
rDNA ITS and nuclear rpb2 sequences, morphological and ecological data.
The species belongs to section Bovini and its closest relative is
European C. bovinus.
